email_body: i didn't say you couldnt come down. just not to expect much From: Margaret Allen@ENRON on 10/25/2000 04:11 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Re: Okay, you get reprieve on this today. But I do have curly hair and high boots on. Have a GREAT (said like Tony Tiger) date, and don't attack her like you did the last one. MSA
